§ Sala Inspirations

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

⚠️ **SPOILER ALERT**

The inspiration for the name of the [[sala]] character from [[world-18]] comes from the words of a (ficticous) //magical incantation// from the song named //The Magic Song//:

― sala-gadoola-menchicka-boola bibbidi-bobbidi-boo
